title: The figure presents the graph of 3 curves in a ...

content.question: The graph above represents the proportions of hatchlings of certain types of reptiles that are male at different egg incubation temperatures. Which of the following claims is best supported by the data?

choices.label: The expression of sex-determination genes in certain reptiles is influenced by temperature.
Green turtle eggs do not hatch at temperatures above 35Â°C.
In reptiles, sex determination is influenced by the sex ratio of the existing population.
Incubating lizard eggs at constant low temperatures produces a large proportion of males.

content.answer: The expression of sex-determination genes in certain reptiles is influenced by temperature.

skill.text: 6.B: Support a claim with evidence from biological principles, concepts, processes, and data.
